About

Hello, my name is Awoyemi Patrick Gbenga. My front-end developer career began over a year ago with Bincom Global Tech Program; it has been a fantastic and challenging experience thus far, with rapid growth in my attention to detail, improved confidence and good organizational abilities. Driven to learn, grow, and achieve success in front-end engineering. At Bincom, I'm focusing on analyzing and enhancing the dynamic of my front-end development progress.
